mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM ANNOUNCE WHERE ANN_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ANNOUNCE WHERE ANN_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ANN_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANNOUNCE ( ANN_NO, ANN_TITLE, ANN_WRITER, ANN_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANN_NO.NEXTVAL, #{annTitle}, #{annWriter}, #{annContent} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ANNOUNCE SET ANN_COUNT = ANN_COUNT + 1 WHERE ANN_NO = #{annNo} AND ANN_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ANNOUNCE WHERE ANN_STATUS = 'Y' AND ANN_NO = #{annNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ANNOUNCE WHERE ANN_STATUS = 'Y'
AND ANN_TITLE
AND ANN_CONTENT
LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

AND ANN_TITLE
AND ANN_CONTENT
LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY ANN_NO DESC
